DBSettings.Username: REQUIRED: Set via DBSettings__Username environment variable
DBSettings.Password: REQUIRED: Set via DBSettings__Password environment variable

Cognito.Region: REQUIRED: Set via Cognito__Region environment variable
Cognito.UserPoolId: REQUIRED: Set via Cognito__UserPoolId environment variable
Cognito.ClientId: REQUIRED: Set via Cognito__ClientId environment variable

ConnectionStrings.PostgreSQL: REQUIRED: Set via ConnectionStrings__PostgreSQL environment variable
